text: Bursera lunanii is a species of plant in the Burseraceae family. It is endemic to Jamaica and listed as "near threatened."World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Bursera lunanii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. ==References== Category:Plants described in 1825 lunanii Category:Near threatened plants Category:Endemic flora of Jamaica Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
